channel.title: Plan :: DevDocs Navigation Menu Test
channel.description: Plan Click here to give feedback about this page Section Notes The Plan section targets developers wanting to understand how to plan out their enterprise solutions and their app integration builds strategically and holistically. It covers: Available access control strategies Available authentication methods (MFA, biometrics, etc) Policies Deployment considerations including topics such as: Availability Reliability Performance etc About This Page Is this a new page?: Completely new doc with new content
